alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 25 at 6:17AM PDT until March 29 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches between 6000 and 8000 feet. One to two feet of snow above 8000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...Late Monday night through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. Heavy snow will increase snow load on area rooftops and structures making them more prone to collapse.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
